The college does not organize any entrance examination for the students to aspire to get admission to the Distance Education Programme of the college. However, the students who wish to go with the B.Ed Programme of the college under the Distance Education have to clear the Common Entrance Test (CET) of the college. The college also offers good placement opportunities for the students and scholarships are also given to the students, generally who have come from the backward classes. If you are looking for the best Distance Education College in the mentioned streams, Mangalore University, Center for Distance Education, Karnataka can be the best pick for you.

The college offers Undergraduate courses such as M.B.B.S, B.S Nursing, and Diploma in Nursing and Postgraduate courses such as MD, MS, DNB, and CPS. The admission criteria of GIMS Gadag is entrance-based for the UG programs and merit-based for the PG programs. Students applying for admission must follow the only offline procedure by submitting the hard copy of the application form directly at the college admissions office.

Karwar Institute Of Medical Science (KIMS) is a government medical college located in Karwar. It is affiliated with Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Science (RGUHS).

Kodagu Institute of Medical Sciences (KIMS), situated in Madikeri, Karnataka was established in 2016. It is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore and approved by MCI. The institute offers a full-time MBBS program of 4.5 years duration with 1 year of mandatory internship. The admission is purely entrance-based. The college has good infrastructure and well-experienced faculty members.

College_Summary: Regional College of Management (RCM), Bangalore is ranked 5th Best B-School in South India and ranked 20 all over India. RCMB is well known for its PGDM, MBA program. RCM Bangalore offers degree and certificate courses in the discipline of Business Administration and Management. RCM Bangalore is in the premier institute list of SBI along with IITs, IIMs and NITs. The institute maintains a 100% placement record every year. During the 2022 placement drive, the highest salary package of INR 45 LPA and an average salary of INR 8.5 LPA was offered. Reputed recruiters like HCL Technologies, AXIS Bank, HDFC Bank, Genpact, Mphasis visited the campus.

College_Summary: Sri Devaraj Urs Medical College shortly referred to as SDUMC, is a constituent college of Sri Devaraj Urs Academy of Higher Education and Research under the aegis of Sri Devaraj Urs Educational Trust for Backward Classes, Kolar, Karnataka. The college offers an MBBS program, 14 MD courses, 5 MS courses, 10 Ph.D. courses, and 1 Fellowship. Admissions to the undergraduate and postgraduate courses are done on the basis of NEET UG and PG, while admissions to the Ph.D. courses are done on the basis of an entrance examination.

St. Hopkins College, Karnataka is the name of another excellence in the field of MBA studies. This college is included in the top 10 MBA Colleges in Bangalore. Generally St. Hopkins College is noted for its MBA program but it also offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in different specializations like BA, B.Com, BCA, BBM, and M.Com, PG Diploma, etc. Admission to all the courses is direct except MBA as for MBA they have a common aptitude test. Applicants seeking admission to the institute may apply online. The institute is well equipped with all the facilities with the motive of providing premier experience and learning to their students.

The college has been named after the name of an educational society ‘Rajajinagar Parents Association’.

College_Name: ICAT Design and Media College, Bangalore
College_Summary: ICAT Design and Media College, Bangalore, Karnataka is a premier media college established in the year 2004. This institution is affiliated to Bharathiar University and Birmingham City University, United Kingdom. It is the first media college obtaining ISO 9001:2008 certification. ICAT College Bangalore offers B.Sc., B.Sc. (Hons.), B.A (Hons.), PG Diploma, and M.Sc. programs to its students. Well-reputed companies recruit a good number of students from this college every year.

St. Joseph’s Evening college was set up in 1972. It is an autonomous college and has been accredited by NAAC with B++ grade. St. Joseph evening college is affiliated with Bangalore University. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses under various specializations. Admission to the college is done on the basis of merit scored in the previous qualifying examination. At present, there are 1300 students studying in various UG, PG and diploma courses.

College_Name: St. Francis de Sales College, Bangalore
College_Summary: St. Francis de Sales College, manned by the Missionaries of St. Francis de Sales of South West India Province, is a private institute offering UG and PG courses in the streams of Arts, Science, Commerce, Fine Arts, Management, and Computer Applications. The popular courses provided by the college are BA, BBA, B.Sc, B.Com, MA, M.Sc, and MBA. SFS College admissions for all the courses except the MBA program, are based on merits obtained by the students in the previous qualifying exams. The MBA program admissions are based on management entrance exams conducted by various authorized bodies. Students may apply online for the admission process.

St. Claret College (SCC), Bangalore is managed by the Claretian educational society established with the aim of providing holistic and quality education to the people in and around North Bangalore. The institute is ranked 94th for Computer Application by India Today. SCC offers undergraduate, postgraduate and postgraduate diploma courses in the discipline of Commerce, Science, Travel & Tourism, etc. Apart from St. Claret College, the campus has three other educational institutions:

RJS Institute of Management Studies - [RJSIMS], Bangalore
College_Summary: RJSInstitute of Management Studies established in 1995 was acknowledged as the 3rd Best B-School by AIMA (All India Management Association) in the year 2003 in Business India. RJS Institute of Management Studies is situated in Bangalore in Karnataka state of India and is accredited by AICTE. It's located within the heart of the town with a well-equipped infrastructure. RJS college campus is in a lavish 6 Acres. It also provides value added courses, Bridge courses, Add on and Enrichment courses.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Commerce [B.Com] (Logistics and Supply Chain Management)

College_Summary: Vivekananda Institute of Management is a private management institute established by the Janatha Education Society in 2013-14 in Bangalore, Karnataka. It is approved by AICTE and recognized by the Government of Karnataka. Vivekananda Institute of Management Bangalore is affiliated with Bengaluru City University. It offers UG and PG courses namely, BBA, BCA, MBA, and M.Com. Additionally, the institute is offering some value-added programs in Digital Marketing, Auditing, Finance Modelling, Python, etc. Vivekananda Institute of Management Bangalore has an 85% placement percentage rate. The institute offers all the necessary facilities like, a library, hostels, internet connectivity, sports facilities, etc. Vivekananda Institute of Management Bangalore also offers scholarships to students based on their merit and financial background.

College_Summary: Government First grade College, Vijayanagara, Bengaluru was founded in 1985. It is affiliated to Bangalore University and accredited with’ by NAAC with grade ‘B and 2.72 CGPA. It is also recognized under 2f and 12B of UGC act. It has been ranked no. 6 at state level and 23rd at National level among the Government Institutions.

College_Name: Oxbridge Group of Institutions, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Oxbridge Group of Institutions is a rising star in the field of business education in South India. Recognized by the Government of Karnataka, Oxbridge is affiliated with the Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) and the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). Certain courses are also run under Rajiv Gandhi University of Health and Science (RGUHS) and The Bangalore University (BU).

College_Name: Ramaiah Institute of Legal Studies, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: Ramaiah Institute of Legal Studies is a leading Private college which is based in Bangalore and was founded in 2016 under the aegis of M S Ramaiah Foundation. College_Summary: Dayanand Sagar College of Arts and Science, Bengaluru, Karnataka is a Private college established in 1978. Affiliated with Bangalore University. The institute is a part of Dayananda Sagar Institutions (DSI). DSCASC offers various PG and UG courses in arts, science, and commerce faculty. Eligibility for UG courses is 10+2 passed and for PG courses is Graduation passed in relevant field from a recognized University. Admissions are based on merit obtained by students in qualifying exams or entrance test scores.

Employees' State Insurance Corporation Medical College and Hospital, Gulbarga is popularly known as ESIC Medical College, Gulbarga was established in the year 2013. It is a government institution situated over an area of 50.26 acres.

Koppal Institute of Medical Sciences was founded by the Government of Karnataka as Autonomous Medical College in the year 2015. It caters to the urgent need for medical doctors, nurses, and technicians. It is affiliated with Rajiv Gandhi Koppal Institute of Medical Sciences of Health Sciences and approved by the Medical Council of India. The college aims to provide education with affordable fees for all the sections of society. The Medical Council of India has approved intake of 150 seats per year under MBBS. The average passing percentage is more than 80% for the regular batches. Both regular batch and odd batch have a high pass out percentage.

ISBR Law College, Bangalore, Karnataka is a private institute established in the year 1990 under the aegis of Bangalore Education Trust. It is affiliated to Karnataka State Law University (KSLU), Hubli. ISBR operates two international campuses in Bangalore and Chennai. ISBR Law College, Bangalore offers several legal courses such as BBA LLB, LLB, PGD (Cyber Law and Information Technology), and Certification (Constitutional Law). Admissions to various courses are entrance-based and seats of some courses are offered as merit-based admission. This institution is approved by the Bar Council of India.

ICRI Bangalore Campus offers a wide range of courses in Clinical Research, Aviation, Logistics & Supply Chain Management. The institute offers B.Sc., M.Sc., Diploma and PG Diploma at the UG and PG level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in entrance examination. College_Summary: Soundarya Institute of Management and Science(SIMS) is located at Bangalore, in the state of Karnataka. This institute was affiliated to Bangalore university and approved by UGC and recognised by AICTE. The Institute has been accredited with NAAC Grade B.

College_Name: Teachers Academy Group Of Institution, Bangalore
College_Summary: Teachers' Academy Group of Institutions is situated in Bangalore, Karnataka State of India. It is affiliated with the University of Mysore. The college offers BBM, B.Com, BCA, BA, B.Sc. at the UG level and M.Com, MCA, MBA at the PG level. Students can apply for admission online and offline. The college has experienced faculty and top-class infrastructure to enhance the learning process. The placement cell arranges campus interviews to provide job opportunities in reputed companies

College_Name: KLE Society's Raja Lakhamagouda Science Institute, Belagavi
College_Summary: KLE Society’s Raja Lakhamagouda Science Institute is an Autonomous college in Belgaum( or Belagavi) city, Karnataka. The Science wing of the already existing Lingaraj Arts College was later named Raja Lakhamagouda Science Institute after the name of Sardar Raja Lakhagouda Basavaprabhu Sirdesai who contributed a lot to the development of the college.

College_Summary: Indian Institute of Fashion Technology Bangalore popularly known as IIFT Bangalore is a private fashion designing institute established in 2001. The institute is affiliated with Bangalore University and Karnataka State Women’s University. IIFT Bangalore offers B.Sc, M.Sc, Diploma and Certificate courses. Admission is based on merit in the previous qualifying examination. IIFT Bangalore has become a member of the Rotaract Club.

Moreover, the college provides lateral entry admission on the basis of Portfolio Assessment and Personal Interaction.

Sivananda Sharma, with only six students, enrolled at the beginning. RVILS is ranked 37th amongst the Top 50 Private Law Colleges of India by the New Education Post 2021 and ranked amongst the Top 20 Promising Educational Institutes in Bengaluru 2019 by Higher Education Review. The college offers BA LLB and BBA LLB as 5 years integrated courses. Admission to RVILS Bangalore is merit-based. Applicants should have passed the 10+2 or equivalent from a board recognized by the Central or State Government. The candidates can apply online or offline mode. College_Summary: BMS College of Commerce and Management is a Bangalore based distinguished Private college which was founded in 2017 and offers an extensive range of career oriented Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in the discipline of Commerce, Business Administration, Computer Applications, Management and Accountancy for both aspiring students and working professionals. The college is approved by Bangalore University and managed and administered by the BMS Educational Trust of Bengaluru. Admission to institute’s courses is granted to students based on their merit in preceding year qualifying exam and score of entrance tests like CAT/MAT/ATMA.

College_Summary: CREO Valley School of Film and Television is a Private College established in 2013. The CREO Valley college is located in Bangalore city in Karnataka. The Institute offers Undergraduate courses in Graphic Design, Animation, Multimedia, Fashion Design, and Interior Designing, and a Diploma in Film making.

College_Summary: Sacred Heart College, Dakshin Kannada is a private co-educational college established in the year1982. It is affiliated to Mangalore University and has been accredited by NAAC by Grade A. The College offers B.A., B.Com, BCA, at the UG level and M.Com at the PG level under the guidance of highly-qualified faculties. Apart from these, it also offers add-on courses. Admission is done on a merit basis and students can apply online through the official website. The college is well-equipped with modern facilities to facilitate the learning process.

PES Polytechnic College of Bangalore was established in 1972 under the government of Karnataka. College offers multiple courses in Diploma, Undergraduate and Postgraduate degrees in Science, Commerce, Pharmacy, Engineering, Medicine, and Management. For admission to the course, the candidate should have passed 10+2. The admission registration form is available online.

College_Name: KLE Society' s Degree College, Bangalore
PISM Campus - Powered by Sunstone's Edge, Bangalore
College_Summary: Sunstone Eduversity, PISM Institute Campus, Bangalore comes under the aegis of Sunstone Eduversity. PISM Institution offers a 2 year PGDM program, approved by the UGC. Admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in various national and state entrance exams. The institute has witnessed 100% placement for its PGDM program. The highest package is offered at INR 10 LPA. PISM Institutions also provides a 9 month paid internship to gain hands-on industry experience.

Hindustan Aviation Academy (HAA), Bengaluru was founded in 1983, it is approved by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation, Ministry of Civil Aviation, Government of India. It is affiliated with the Bharathiar University. The institute collaborates with organizations like IATA - Canada, Airworks India Engineering- India’s largest third-party Maintenance, Repair & Overhauling organization, SR Technics- Switzerland, Deviation- Malaysia, Toyota, and many other reputed organizations to ensure that the students gain the necessary industry experience and increase their employability. HAA Bangalore offers 5 different Bachelor and Diploma courses to its students.

KLAY is one of India’s Largest and Most Trusted chain of Preschool and Daycare Centres. It was founded in 2011 with its first center in Whitefield, Bengaluru. Now, it has become a large organization with 150 centers spread all over India and some overseas also. It has won copious awards such as The Top Preschool Award, 2018 from the Global Triumph Foundation, Education ICON of the Year, 2018 from Education Today, and many more. It also offers an International Diploma in Preschool Education (IDPE) to the students who have completed their formal education till 10+2 level. Interested students who wish to pursue a diploma in Preschool Education may apply online.

Government Polytechnic Belgaum is a polytechnic institute that was established in 1958. The institute started offering courses in civil, electrical, and mechanical engineering and at present, they offer 6 diploma courses with the new inclusion of Automobile, electronics and communication, and Commercial practice specializations. It follows the norms and conditions of the National Board of Accreditation. It has dedicated faculty whose cooperative efforts help in the smooth running of the institute in this competitive and challenging world. The institute is affiliated to the Directorate of Technical Education, Karnataka.

Sanjay Memorial Polytechnic (SMP), Shimoga is a polytechnic institute registered under Sanjay Vidya Kendra Society running under the guidance of Shri Kagodu Thimmappa. The institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and is affiliated to DTE, Karnataka. The institute is one of the largest polytechnic institutes in the state with more than 20 acres of campus. The institute offers a wide range of technical diploma courses in various fields of engineering. Admission to this institute is merit-based and application for the same will be available on the official website of the Directorate of Education of the state Government.

The students at different campuses of Pearl University will get a UG/ PG degree as enabled by CAES – Rajiv Gandhi National Institute of Youth Development (RGNIYD). The institute has an 11-month weekday professional program in the same field. Pearl Academy Bengaluru has partnered with organizations like, Amazon, Adobe, FDCI, etc. The institute also offers student exchange and semester-abroad programs in collaboration with the University of Europe, the University of Debrecen, Manchester Metropolitan University, etc. Pearl Academy Bengaluru UG students have to participate in the 8-week international lab experience module.

The University provides UG, PG courses like a B.Sc and an M.Sc in the field of Economics. It also offers PhD and integrated Courses like B.Sc+M.Sc courses. The admission is based on both merit and Central Universities Common Entrance Test. It accepts admissions based on merit. The application mode is online.

The institute provides global exposure, industry internships and scholarships to its students.

There are 4 diploma courses offered by the institution in the domain of Engineering and Technology and which are approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. Anyone who is looking forward to admission in the institution must have passed the Karnataka SSLC or equivalent exams by scoring at least 35% of marks.

Academy of Aviation and Engineering (AAE) is one of the reputed colleges established in 2004 located in Bangalore, Karnataka. The institute is approved by DGCA, Government of India and affiliated with Bangalore Central University. It is a venture of the Sha-Shib Group, the largest group in South Asia for imparting training in Aircraft Maintenance Engineering. AAE Bangalore offers 30 courses in Aviation Management, Engineering and Commercial Pilot Licenses under numerous specializations. The institute has 5,000 students enrolled and 18 certified teachers. It has partnerships with leading organizations like Air India Engineering Services Ltd, GMR Air Cargo Aerospace Engineering Ltd, Air Works India Engineering Service Ltd, etc. Academy of Aviation and Engineering accepts SSAT scores to offer admission in various courses.

K.V.T Polytechnic is a polytechnic institute of Karnataka. The institute is one of the first polytechnic institutes in the Kolar and Chikkaballapur region. The institute was established under the guidance of Late Sri C.V Venkatarayappa, aiming at providing technical education to the rural students of the region. K.V.T polytechnic is affiliated with the directorate of technical education, Karnataka. The institute offers diploma programs in five courses. Admission to this institute is regulated by DTE, and there are no exams for the same.

Nagarjuna Degree College is managed by Nagarjuna Group of Institutions and is located in Yelahanka, 22 min drive from the Kempegowda International Airport, Bangalore. The

College_Name: Jain College of BBA, BCA & BCOM, Belgaum
Chennais Amirta International Institute of Hotel Management - [CAIIHM], Bangalore
College_Summary:
Chennais Amirta International Institute of Hotel Management (CAIIHM) was established in 2010. It is one of the leading hotel management institutions spread across southern India in 4 major metro cities. With a sprawling 10+ acre campus in Chennai and 4 more campuses in Bangalore, Balkampet (Hyderabad), Khairtabad (Hyderabad) and Vijayawada is the only institution to provide world-class infrastructure and cultivated comprehensive education for its students. Chennais Amirta offers up to 90% industry-oriented practical classes with over 500 experienced faculty.
The UG, PG and Diploma programs namely BSc Hotel Management, and Diploma and MBA in different streams, cater to students’ preferences and eligibility. The institution is affiliated with major universities and councils such as Alagappa University, Osmania University, Singhania University, Institute of Professional Development (Open University - Malaysia), Jawaharlal Nehru Technical Education- Council of Skill Development, Bharat Sevak Samaj for offering different programs.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Executive Diploma in Hotel Management & Catering Science [EDHMCS]
Professional Diploma in Hotel Management & Catering Science [PDHMCS]

College_Summary: Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism, Bangalore or Seamedu - CMR University offers B.Sc, BCA and a few diploma courses with various specializations in the field of media, filmmaking, and entertainment. The total fee for the B.Sc program is INR 6 Lacs and Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism fees range from 4-5 Lacs for other courses. Admission to all other courses is based on the candidate’s performance in the last qualifying examination. Apart from its Bangalore campus the college also has three other campuses in Pune, Chandigarh, and Mumbai.

College_Name: National School of Journalism and Public Discourse, Bangalore, Karnataka
College_Summary: National School of Journalism and Public Discourse is a leading and private Bangalore based Journalism institute which was established in 2014 and is affiliated to Bengaluru City University. The NSOJ offers UG, PG and Integrated courses in the discipline of Journalism, Law, Psychology and Literature and admission to these courses is permitted to students depending on their 12th or Graduation results. The college cum non-for-profit institute came into existence with a vision to train individuals into such Journalists who are committed to truth, justice and democracy and become true changemakers of it.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Print and Broadcast Journalism
Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Summary: Karnataka Government Polytechnic was established in 1946 and is considered one of the oldest technical colleges in the region. The college offers eight diploma courses which all last around 3 years. KPT also offers evening classes to students who require it. The admission into this institute is based on SSLC, established by the Department of Technical Education, Karnataka. The college also offers admission based on the entrance exam.

Siddaganga Polytechnic is a private institute run by Sree Siddaganga Education Society and established in 1988. The institution is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to DTE, Government of Karnataka. The institute offers diploma courses across five different specializations in the technical field. Admissions are based on the entrance exam followed by an interview.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}
Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB] {Hons.}

College_Summary: Gomatesh Polytechnic College, Belgaum was established in 1960 and started to get transformed in 1982. Earlier, it was started with a diploma in creative disciplines with civil, mechanical, and electrical engineering. Further in the year 1985 and 1989, this college introduced 3 more disciplines that are Electronic and Communication, Automobile Engineering, and Computer Science and Engineering. In the year 2000, this college introduced another department of information science. Likewise, many specializations got added in the proceeding years and currently, it offers around 10 specializations. Placements are provided to about 70% of the students every year.

Government CPC Polytechnic, popularly known as CPC Polytechnic, was established in 1954 under the erstwhile Mysore Government. The institute provides Diploma in Engineering under 6 specializations and also a Diploma in Machine Tools Technology. The admission to the course is based on merit.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Tumkur, also referred to as GPT Tumkur, was established in 1958. The institute offers Diploma courses in 6 specializations. Admissions to these courses are solely merit based. The DTE Karnataka conducts the counselling process for all the polytechnic colleges of Karnataka. The basic eligibility criteria is a 10th pass with at least 35% marks.

Sanjay Gandhi Polytechnic College was established in 1992 as the first premier private co-educational Polytechnic with a vision of becoming an organization of excellence which creates Innovative & Vibrant young Engineers with sound technical knowledge, social responsibilities, and global competency. The Institute offers Diploma Courses in 6 Streams across 1 Discipline.

Shree Niranjana Swamy Polytechnic (SNS) is a Polytechnic Institution that was initiated by the efforts of Shree Niranjana Swamy Education Trust, situated in Mangalore. The college offer diploma courses and the Institution is affiliated to the Department of Technical Education, Bangalore. The only requirement that the college seeks for admission is SSLC (10th) pass with a total of 35% marks and don’t require any ranking cut off marks for the admission.

SJPN Trust's Polytechnic at Belgaum is an institute founded by Shriman Niranjan Jagadguru Late Pancham Sri Nijalingeshwar Mahaswamigalu, Siddha Sounsthanmath, Nidasoshi. This institution was established in 1986 with a vision of providing technical education in various disciplines of Engineering by offering 10 specialized diploma courses. The institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, and is affiliated to DTE, Karnataka. It is also a kind of modern Gurukulam with a total interaction between teachers and students being done on a common campus with the aim of providing quality technical education with decent placement.

College_Name: Government VISL S J Polytechnic - [VISSJ], Bhadravathi
College_Summary: Government VISL S J Polytechnic (VISSJ) is a Government Polytechnic Institute situated in Bhadravathi, Karnataka. It is affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education and is recognised by AICTE. The college offers diploma courses in different streams of Engineering. The admissions to the college are given as per the merit list prepared and this list is based on the marks scored by the candidates. It is a well-known college for pursuing diploma courses in Karnataka and it provides quality education to students during its courses.

Government Polytechnic College located at Belur, Karnataka that got established on the year of 2008, was able to create a name for itself within a short span of time since its inception. It offers diploma courses in various Technical Engineering branches. Admission to the 1st year diploma/ 2nd year direct entry at the college is strictly based on merit only, for which the candidates can fill the online application form. The placements at the institution are not that much pleasing, hence the institution didn’t declare the same.

Smt. L.V. Government Polytechnic, Hassan is a technical educational institution that was set up under the scheme of the Directorate of Technical Education, Bangalore in 1934. It started offering Diploma courses from 1957 onwards. The Diploma course is offered in 5 engineering specializations. Admission is completely merit-based through candidates’ marks in qualifying examinations.

J.V Mandals Polytechnic Terdal is one of the prominent institutes under the Shree Bahubali Vidyapeeth that is situated in Bagalkot, Karnataka. This institute offers various diploma programs. It has an affiliation with the Department of Technical Education, Bengaluru and this institute is approved by AICTE. The admission process is entrance-based, which accepts Karnataka Polytechnic exam scores followed by a counselling process to finalize the seat allotment to the eligible students.

College_Name: Nitte Rukmini Adyanthaya Memorial Polytechnic - [NRAM], Udupi
College_Summary: Nitte Rukmini Adyanthaya Memorial Polytechnic (NRAM) was the first Polytechnic college in south Kanara District and it got recognized as Government Aided Institution from 2001. The institution offers 3-year diploma degree in 5 branches of Engineering. Besides these, the college also offers Diploma in Apparel Design and Fabrication Technology. The college admits students on the basis of marks obtained in SSLC/ equivalent examination. The placement record of the college has been consistent over the recent years, with good number of students being placed every year.

The Oxford Polytechnic was established in the year 1986 by Sri. S. Narasa Raju under the patronage of the College of Directorate of Technical Education, Bangalore. The college offers Diploma Courses in both Engineering and Non-Engineering fields. It offers a Diploma in Commercial Practice (English) as the non-engineering specialization. The admission procedure is completely merit-based through candidates’ marks in their qualifying examinations. Candidates who have passed 10th examination are eligible to apply for admission.

Government Polytechnic Bantwal is one of the premier institutes of excellence operating under the government of Karnataka. It is situated in Bantwal, Karnataka. This institute offers various diploma programs in the aegis of Engineering discipline. It has an affiliation with the Department of Technical Education, Karnataka to offer its diploma courses. The course admission is merit-based, that accepts students after clearing the counselling process to finalize admission.

Government Polytechnic Hubbali, Dharwad is a Government Polytechnic College situated in Karnataka State. This is a newly established institute situated in the heart of the Dharwad city. It is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to DTE (Directorate of Technical Education, Karnataka). The college offers Engineering diploma in different branches of Engineering. The Counselling procedure for this college is conducted by DTE itself. The college is equipped with all modern technologies to help students in developing their skills, which in turn helps them to face all the future competitions.

College_Name: Sri Tontada Siddhalingeshwar Kalyan Kendra Polytechnic - [STSKKP], Gadag
College_Summary: Sri Tontada Siddhalingeshwar Kalyan Kendra Polytechnic (STSKKP) at Gadag, Karnataka offers diploma degree in five major disciplines of Engineering namely: Civil, Computer, Electrical and Electronics, Electronics and Communication, and Mechanical Engineering. The college admits students on the basis of marks obtained in SSLC 10th Board examination or equivalent. The placement record of the college has been quite impressive and has increased over the years with top recruiters like HCL, Vodafone, Bharti Group Careers, LG, Voltas, TVS, Nokia, and Amway, etc. visiting the college frequently for the placements drive.

T.M.A.E’s Polytechnic is a private Co-Ed institute in Karnataka State, approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to College of Directorate of Technical Education, Bangalore .The college offers 8 diploma courses in the stream of engineering. The college has various certifications like ISO and USAL Quality. Admissions into diploma are based on merit only. The college has various laboratories with all required equipments and a central library. The college is spread across 8 acres and the atmosphere is clean and productive for education.

Dr. T.M.A. Pai Polytechnic is one of the most renowned and reputed Polytechnic Institutions in India, which is situated in the Manipal District of Karnataka. The institute offers a 3-years diploma degree across several streams of Engineering and Technology. For students seeking admission in this reputed organization, the important criteria that they need to fulfil is passing SSLC (10th std.) by obtaining 35% marks in Science and Mathematics subjects. The institution caters to provide a quality education to the population of Dakshina Kannada and Udupi including students from other states as well.
